    Version: This is a pre-release (draft) version of the GP Connect API specification and is subject to change. For the current version and other specifications, please visit GP Connect specifications page.

    Communication channels

    Communication channels used by the GP Connect team

    Enquires

    For general enquires please send an email to the GP Connect team inbox.

    Forums

    A two-way channel to allow the supplier community to engage with each other and NHS Digital to seek support related to product development.

    • GP Connect forum

    Issues

    A system used so that suppliers can report errors and omissions in the documentation, and to help keep track of the progress of resolving these.

    • GP Connect issues
